ygData.subject: RE: Help w/ Dismal Rage quests (poss spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I read the other posts.. their close but not spot on.  Sir Lucan is on the ground floor of the militia building.  AS you first enter it, hes at the room at the
ygData.messageBody:
I read the other posts.. their close but not spot on. Sir Lucan is on the
ground floor of the militia building. AS you first enter it, hes at the
room at the far end of the first corridor - there is a second room past 2
guards.

The person you need to kill is not Altunic Jartin! Its someone fishing near
a lake.... Steal his note and hand it in to the SK guild in freeport
instead of Sir Lucan - I'm actually going to do it again to see what happens
if you give Lucan the note.



-----Original Message-----
From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
Sent: 23 September 1999 18:34
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Help w/ Dismal Rage quests (poss spoiler)


From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>

"Grant, Joseph" wrote:
>
> From: "Grant, Joseph" <JGrant@...>
>
> I think the Militia leader is Sir Lucan. You can increase your faction
with
> the militia by killing Deathfist orcs or the Paladins of North freeport
> (most fun!) You can get to north freeport via the tunnels.
>

Which part of Freeport is Sir Lucan in? I can travel freely in North
Freeport, but I assume he is not there, since that is Pally land. I
think once upon a time I could travel in Freeport, but then I discovered
Krazen Loosh...

> The note for Sir Lucan is gained somewhere in the West Commonlands, I also
> believe that this quest is the exact reverse of a paladin quest, the
> paladins have to find and save this character, we have to kill him....

So I have heard, but I want to do all the steps so I can see if
there's some hint in there someone has missed.

Xilith
